headline: My 2 Top Oil Stocks to Buy in 2025
summary: Crude oil prices were relatively quiet last year.  Brent oil, the global benchmark price, slipped 3%, closing the year at around $77 a barrel.  Meanwhile, WTI, the U.S. oil price benchmark, ended the year right where it began at roughly $71 per barrel.
